Name: Flinch
About the game: EARLY ACCESS. CONTENT CREATION IS ONGOING AND ROUTINE! Flinch is a VR horror game about terrifying yourself, but more importantly your friends and loved ones. You're racing against time and trying to keep your cool. Flinch monitors your behaviors and can detect when you jerk or move suddenly if you get frightened. Eeek! A second player or party can use the keyboard to try to scare the in-game player. Something evil is lurking waiting to strike!!! Monsters will attempt to attack you, but light is you friend. Keep them at bay using torches and lighting candles. Navigate a maze of suspense and last as long as you can! Most importantly, don't flinch!
